Lucid: Send Multiple Files to Ollama

lucid.modelName.description: Name of the model to use in Ollama

lucid.enableInlineCompletion.description: Enable inline code completions (ghost text) in the editor

lucid.ollamaExtraHeaders.description: Optional additional headers to send to Ollama API (also can set OLLAMA_EXTRA_HEADERS env var as JSON)

lucid.ollamaApiKey.description: Optional API key for Ollama. Can also be provided via OLLAMA_API_KEY environment variable

lucid.logUnmaskedHeaders.description: If true, log full (unmasked) sensitive headers in curl logs

lucid.logUnmaskedHeadersInDev.description: If true, allow unmasked header logging when the extension runs in development mode
